title: Drawing, "Gold Grasses on Yellow Ground", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gold paint, pen and blue ink, graphite on heavy cream paper with printed yellow ground
markings: Stamp in red on verso, center, within horizontal rectangle with rounded corners:  TOMMI PARZINGER/30 E 23 ST [crossed out, inscribed in pen and blue ink:  320 E 57th] NEW YORK CITY/DESIGN FOR: /inscribed in graphite:  Design:  No 3
inscribed:
Inscribed on verso in pen and blue ink within stamp:  320 E 57th; Design:  No. 3
Lower right in graphite: Tommi Parzinger
description: Long feathered grass bending left and right with empty stems between.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Gold Grasses on Yellow Ground", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gold paint, pen and blue ink, graphite on heavy cream paper with printed yellow ground. Gift of Donald Cameron. 1998-19-140.
